content: a slip_stitch at any point in the nose hole chain 1 single_crochet around slip_stitch to join fasten_off weave in ends mouth step 1 attach with a slip_stitch to the opposite side of the chain 10 from front face panel row 17 and over 3 chains from the side chain 1 single_crochet in same chain single_crochet in next 4 chains don t fasten_off continue to next step step 2 single_crochet around the entire mouth including into the single_crochet s you just made step 3 once you get all the way around once slip_stitch toward the top of the mouth and add about 8 more single_crochet s to give the mouth a large upper lip flap then fasten_off designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items adding wrinkles with brown step 1 starting at any point along the edge surface slip_stitch in a not-so-straight line to different points fasten_off with a long tail step 2 using the tail weave it through the slip_stitch s you just made and pull it semi- tight to create an uneven crooked raised line step 3 repeat steps 1 & 2 as many times as you want wrinkles final assembly using tacky glue or hot glue add some under the front panel face to adhere the face panel down to the felt particularly the bottom lip that may be leaning forward or use sewing thread and a needle to adhere the face down to the felt designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items reference photos enjoy your new necronomicon ex-mortis book of the dead if you would like to support my designs you can buy me a coffee on venmo @thoseyellowthings designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items
